The Catholic Church is old. Its ideas are old. Many people do not agree with the Church on things like gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Church has strong views on these things. Some people think the Church's views are wrong.

Some people are leaving the Catholic Church. They do not like the Church's views. Some people want the Church to change. They want the Church to be more accepting.

For example, the Church is against abortion. If a person is for abortion, they may not like the Church. The Church is also against gay marriage. If a person is for gay marriage, they may not like the Church.

Some people think women should be priests. Some people think priests should be married.

The Catholic Church does not allow women to be priests. The Church does not allow priests to be married.

I think gay marriage is good. People are born this way. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be different from others.

It is wrong to say only a man and a woman can marry.  If two people love each other, they should be happy.

I do not know much about this, but I think it is wrong to say gay people cannot marry.

I think people are born this way. Some are born straight. Some are born gay. It is not a choice.

I do not think the government should say who can marry. It is a personal thing. It is not the government's job.

Gay marriage is good. There is no good reason to say it is bad. Some people think that gay couples are bad for families. But this is not true. Gay couples are different, but that does not mean they are bad. It is like two sides of a coin. 

Gay couples should have the same rights as straight couples. This includes things like health care. If a person is sick, their partner should be able to see them in the hospital.  

Many studies show that gay couples are happy. They have the same things in their relationships that make them strong. It is just a relationship.

Gay couples are not asking to marry in a church. They want a marriage paper from the government. The government should not mix religion with laws.

Some people say that gay marriage is wrong because of their religion. But the government should not make laws based on religion.

Gay people are the same as straight people. They want to be happy and have families. Children of gay couples are the same as children of straight couples.

I work at a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are bad. Some drugs are good. The law says some drugs are bad. This does not mean they are never good. Some drugs are good for sickness.

Marijuana is a bad drug in the eyes of the law. But it can help people who are sick. I think people should have access to good medicine.  

Many drugs are bad in the eyes of the law. Pharmacies use them to help people.

We use drugs like oxycotton. We use drugs like Vicodin. These drugs are controlled. But they help people. Marijuana can help people too.

I think this is different from alcohol. Alcohol can be bad too. But marijuana is not as bad as other drugs.

I think we need to make marijuana legal. But we should do it slowly.

People have bad ideas about marijuana because it is against the law. Marijuana is not as bad as other drugs.

If we change how people think about marijuana, they will use it in a good way.

The church has changed. It is not as strict now as it was before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a pretty dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church together.

Now, when I am older, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People wear casual clothes. In summer, people come in their beach clothes. Families come in late sometimes.

The church is more casual now. Even at the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis. 

The biggest change is how people dress.


About the priests, I do not think the church could have stopped the bad things that happened. Some married men are pedophiles. They are attracted to young children. Getting married would not stop this. 

It is the person's choice to become a priest. Some religions allow priests to marry. If someone wants to marry and practice their faith, they should think about a different religion.

I think pedophilia is a genetic thing. I do not think people choose to be pedophiles. I think they are born that way. Marriage would not change this.

The Iraq War made me sad. The Bush group said the war was about stopping bad men. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. But these things were not true.  

The Bush group lied to people. They did not tell the truth. Colin Powell said he was not sure the things were true when he talked to the world. This is wrong. It is bad for the leader of a country to lie. 

The Bush group did not care about the laws of the country. They wanted to go to war. The Bush group wanted to make war with Iraq.

The war has gone on for a long time.  It is bad. Leaving now may cause more problems.  

The United Nations wants to help. They want other countries to help. But this may cause more problems, too. Iraq's leaders are not strong. They cannot control the country.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. I do not think it is a real war because Congress did not say it was a war. I feel it started because we wanted to get back at Iraq for the attacks on nine eleven.  

I do not think we should stay in Iraq. It is hard to build democracy there. It takes time. If we leave, Iraq will be angry. If we stay, we will make Iraq more like the United States. This will upset the people of Iraq. 

Many people I know have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home safe. But I also worry about the people of Iraq. The war has made their lives hard. They do not have schools. Groups are fighting because of their beliefs. 

I think the war will go on for a long time. The people in Iraq are very different from us. We cannot change them. It is better if we leave.

The speaker thinks it is wrong for the government to make laws about religion. The speaker says the Constitution says that the government and church should be separate. The speaker says that trying to make laws about religion is wrong. The speaker says that it would be like the government picking one religion over another. 

The speaker thinks that the government should not make laws about what churches can and cannot say. The speaker thinks that the Constitution protects religious freedom. The speaker says that the government should not make a new law to stop this. The speaker says that the government should not control what people can believe. 

The speaker does not think the government should be involved in this issue. The speaker says that the person pushing for this law is doing it because of their own beliefs. The speaker thinks the churches should make their own rules.

The war in Iraq is hard. The government did not tell the people the real reason for the war. People think the war started because of the attacks on September 11th. This is not true. The government made people think this way to make them angry about the attacks. The war started in 2003. 

I do not like war. It is wrong to start a war before someone attacks you. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from its mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Iraq. This is sad. 

The government took away Iraq's leaders. They did not plan for what would happen after. The government tried to make a new government in Iraq, but it is hard. This is like what happened in Vietnam. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. It was not. The war has been going on for a long time. Many American soldiers are still there. The government is trying to teach the Iraqi people how to run their own country.

The government should have been more careful. They should have known that it would be hard to make a new government in Iraq. It takes a long time to build a democracy. 

We are still in Iraq today. Many people are still dying. It is hard to know what to do. We cannot leave Iraq now. But too many people are dying. 

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there will be peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I have always done so. I think it is a choice people make. It is now known to be part of a person. Some people are born this way.

It is wrong to take away rights from people because of this.

I think the government should not be involved in this. It is a private matter.

I know gay couples. They live like other families.

I think it is wrong for the government to say what marriage is.

I have read that being gay is part of how a person is made. It is not a choice.

It is not fair that gay people cannot marry. 

People can get married without telling anyone. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is a big news story. 

Marriage should be a private matter.

The internet is for all people to see. If you put things on the internet, people will read them. People may think bad things about you if you say bad things. If you say things about hurting people, someone will tell. The school must act. They want to keep people safe. 

You cannot know if things are true or not. Some people joke, but some people mean what they say. The school must be careful. 

One time, someone said something bad. A friend saw it on the internet and told the school. The school looked at the person's internet pages. Some things were funny, but some things were scary. The school had to be careful.

When you put things on the internet, it is like sharing them with everyone. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the internet. You cannot control what people think.

School leaders should not be friends with students on the internet. It is not right to look at their pages. 

If someone tells the school about something bad on the internet, the school must act. It is not an invasion of privacy because the student shared it with someone.

The war has gone on too long. At first, we tried to help. We wanted to give people in another country a better way to choose leaders. But I think we lost sight of that goal. Now, we fight just to show we are strong. Maybe the reason to start the war was not good. George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before. If we wanted to give democracy to a country without fair rules, that would be good. But maybe there were bad reasons too.

The war lasted for many months. We showed our power in the early days. But now, it has been many years. I think it is too long. 

If we wanted to help a country with a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But now, I think our reason is unclear. We seem to fight just to win.

The war has gone on long enough. The people in that country need to take care of themselves. We have spent a lot of money. We should use that money to help our own country. We have problems with poverty and other things. We need to spend money on these problems.

We spend billions of dollars on the war. This is too much. We need to spend money on important things like schools, roads, and health care. We should not use money to kill our own people in a war we no longer have a good reason to fight.

Some people say it is bad for people to look at other people's Myspace pages. They say it is not right to see things that are private. But some people say it is not bad. They say that if you put things on Myspace, you are sharing them with everyone. You have to be careful what you put on the web.

It is hard to say if it is right or wrong. Some people use Myspace to talk to friends. Others use it to share information. It is important to be safe online. You should not meet people you do not know from Myspace. 

Some schools do not allow students to have Myspace. This is because they are worried about safety. They do not want students to share too much information online.

The Iraq War is a bad idea. Many people think this. They say it was a bad idea from the start. 

People in the United States, Iraq, and the world think the war was wrong. Many soldiers in the war think so too. They want to go home.

The war was bad before we went there. It is bad now. Leaving will be hard, but staying is bad too.

The United States and the Middle East are very different. The United States tries to bring democracy to the Middle East, but this does not work. People in the Middle East want to run their own lives.

Saddam Hussein was bad. But we should think about the good and bad before we go to war with a country.

The war was like quicksand. We went in and got stuck.

I do not know what to say. I do not see a reason to stay in Iraq.

The government says we need to stay. They say there will be problems if we leave. I do not agree. I have not heard a good reason to stay.

We could leave slowly. This might be okay. But I want to leave now.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. They say we should go this year. These are the people we are trying to help. They know best.

If we ask them if we should leave and they say yes, then it is not our fault if things go wrong. We will be the good guys.

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving would be better than staying.

Yes, I think people still have different views about men and women. 

It is not just about women. 

It is about the kind of work a person does. 

Women may have a harder time. There is a feeling that women should be in lower jobs, even if they are just as good as men.

This is because of how people have always been.

A woman may be able to do a job well, but some people will not want to give her a higher position.

This is the same for men.

For example, men who stay home to take care of children are often looked down upon. People think men should work outside the house.

In jobs like fashion, men are sometimes not taken seriously.

This is because people think fashion is only for women.

In all jobs, there are times when people are treated differently because they are a man or a woman.

It is hard to change these ideas.

But we are making progress. More women are in high positions.

More men are staying home with their children. 

People are starting to understand that men and women can do any job.

People say that marijuana was not made legal. They say it was made less bad. This means it was not a crime. It is more like a small ticket. You get a ticket, not arrested. People worry about the bad things that could happen if they get a ticket. They worry about jobs and other things.

Decriminalization means it is less bad. But it costs money to arrest people. It costs money to keep people in jail. It costs money to have courts. Some places do not have a lot of money.

Some places are against marijuana. They do not want to make it less bad. Other places are more open to it. They think it is good to spend less money on arrests and more money on other things.

People say marijuana should not be everywhere. It is still bad in some places. Some people do not like to see people smoking it.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana can be bad for a person's life. People react to things differently. Some people can use things in a good way. Some people cannot.

I say yes.

Many things the Catholic Church does are old. They do these things for a long time. It is good to follow traditions. It is also good to change when needed.

Some Catholics must go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

For example, my father was an Episcopalian. My mother was a Catholic. They did not marry in the Catholic Church. The church would not let them marry because of my father’s religion. This is not kind to people of other religions.

We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. It is wrong to say love others but not accept them. I feel the church tells people to do things, but the church does not follow its own rules. The rules are old and should change.

I think it would be good if priests could marry. This might not stop bad things from happening. Priests should not hurt children. This is wrong, no matter if they are married or not.

I think people who hurt children will hurt children. It does not matter if they are married or not.

This is a hard question for me. I am not sure what is right or wrong. But I think this is a very hard problem. It is about church and state. It is also about how to say what marriage is. It is hard to talk about this without hurting people. 

I think all unions should be the same. I don't know if marriage should be decided by the government. Marriage is like a religion. People do not get special things from the government if they are baptized. So, if you are married, the government should just see it as a union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

If all the states agree on something, then they should make it a law for the whole country. But changing the Constitution to say no to gay marriage is not right. The Constitution should not be changed for something that is important to some people. 

It is not important enough to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a family with Christian beliefs. Homosexuality is a hard topic for me. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with this life choice. But I think people should be able to marry. I do not think it is a big problem for the country. I think each state should decide about this. 

Some states are run by Democrats. Some are run by Republicans. Democratic states often support gay marriage. If you live in a state that supports gay marriage, you likely agree with that. You knew this when you moved there. I think you should respect that.

I believe everyone should have the same chances.

I think states should decide about gay marriage. I do not support President Bush's decision to ban it. I think each state should be able to choose. The president does not live in all states. He should not make decisions for all states. Some things should be up to each state. President Bush will not be president forever. A new president may change the law.

I think it is better to let states decide. They are the ones who will live with the decision.

Myspace is for the public. It is like a bulletin board. If you post something on Myspace, others can see it. This includes school officials. They can see what students are posting even if they are not using the school's name.

School officials have a duty to keep students safe. If they see something on Myspace that might stop a school shooting, they have the right to see it.

It is different if they look at Myspace just to find students doing bad things. That is an invasion of privacy.

But if they are trying to make the school safer, it is not an invasion.

Everything on the internet can be found later. This is true even if students do not mean to share things with everyone.

It is important for students to think before they post anything online.

The war is hard. I was strong for it at first. Nine Eleven hurt me. I want to hurt them like they hurt us. But I think we made a mistake. We did not think about the future. We went to war without a plan. Now I am against the war. I think the people there should fight among themselves. We should not fight their fight. 

I do not care about them. They fight too much. They are not like us. We went to war because we were angry. President Bush wanted to go to war. The people wanted to go to war. We did not know what to do. We did not have a good plan.  We did not know how to make things better. 

I think we should leave.

The church is more casual now. Even at the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis. 

The biggest change is how people dress.


About the priests, I do not think the church could have stopped the bad things that happened. Some married men are pedophiles. They are attracted to young children. Getting married would not stop this. 

It is the person's choice to become a priest. Some religions allow priests to marry. If someone wants to marry and practice their faith, they should think about a different religion.

I think pedophilia is a genetic thing. I do not think people choose to be pedophiles. I think they are born that way. Marriage would not change this.

The Iraq War made me sad. The Bush group said the war was about stopping bad men. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. But these things were not true.  

The Bush group lied to people. They did not tell the truth. Colin Powell said he was not sure the things were true when he talked to the world. This is wrong. It is bad for the leader of a country to lie. 

The Bush group did not care about the laws of the country. They wanted to go to war. The Bush group wanted to make war with Iraq.

The war has gone on for a long time.  It is bad. Leaving now may cause more problems.  

The United Nations wants to help. They want other countries to help. But this may cause more problems, too. Iraq's leaders are not strong. They cannot control the country.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. I do not think it is a real war because Congress did not say it was a war. I feel it started because we wanted to get back at Iraq for the attacks on nine eleven.  

I do not think we should stay in Iraq. It is hard to build democracy there. It takes time. If we leave, Iraq will be angry. If we stay, we will make Iraq more like the United States. This will upset the people of Iraq. 

Many people I know have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home safe. But I also worry about the people of Iraq. The war has made their lives hard. They do not have schools. Groups are fighting because of their beliefs. 

I think the war will go on for a long time. The people in Iraq are very different from us. We cannot change them. It is better if we leave.

The speaker thinks it is wrong for the government to make laws about religion. The speaker says the Constitution says that the government and church should be separate. The speaker says that trying to make laws about religion is wrong. The speaker says that it would be like the government picking one religion over another. 

The speaker thinks that the government should not make laws about what churches can and cannot say. The speaker thinks that the Constitution protects religious freedom. The speaker says that the government should not make a new law to stop this. The speaker says that the government should not control what people can believe. 

The speaker does not think the government should be involved in this issue. The speaker says that the person pushing for this law is doing it because of their own beliefs. The speaker thinks the churches should make their own rules.

The war in Iraq is hard. The government did not tell the people the real reason for the war. People think the war started because of the attacks on September 11th. This is not true. The government made people think this way to make them angry about the attacks. The war started in 2003. 

I do not like war. It is wrong to start a war before someone attacks you. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from its mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Iraq. This is sad. 

The government took away Iraq's leaders. They did not plan for what would happen after. The government tried to make a new government in Iraq, but it is hard. This is like what happened in Vietnam. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. It was not. The war has been going on for a long time. Many American soldiers are still there. The government is trying to teach the Iraqi people how to run their own country.

The government should have been more careful. They should have known that it would be hard to make a new government in Iraq. It takes a long time to build a democracy. 

We are still in Iraq today. Many people are still dying. It is hard to know what to do. We cannot leave Iraq now. But too many people are dying. 

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there will be peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I have always done so. I think it is a choice people make. It is now known to be part of a person. Some people are born this way.

It is wrong to take away rights from people because of this.

I think the government should not be involved in this. It is a private matter.

I know gay couples. They live like other families.

I think it is wrong for the government to say what marriage is.

I have read that being gay is part of how a person is made. It is not a choice.

It is not fair that gay people cannot marry. 

People can get married without telling anyone. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is a big news story. 

Marriage should be a private matter.

The internet is for all people to see. If you put things on the internet, people will read them. People may think bad things about you if you say bad things. If you say things about hurting people, someone will tell. The school must act. They want to keep people safe. 

You cannot know if things are true or not. Some people joke, but some people mean what they say. The school must be careful. 

One time, someone said something bad. A friend saw it on the internet and told the school. The school looked at the person's internet pages. Some things were funny, but some things were scary. The school had to be careful.

When you put things on the internet, it is like sharing them with everyone. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the internet. You cannot control what people think.

School leaders should not be friends with students on the internet. It is not right to look at their pages. 

If someone tells the school about something bad on the internet, the school must act. It is not an invasion of privacy because the student shared it with someone.

The war has gone on too long. At first, we tried to help. We wanted to give people in another country a better way to choose leaders. But I think we lost sight of that goal. Now, we fight just to show we are strong. Maybe the reason to start the war was not good. George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before. If we wanted to give democracy to a country without fair rules, that would be good. But maybe there were bad reasons too.

The war lasted for many months. We showed our power in the early days. But now, it has been many years. I think it is too long. 

If we wanted to help a country with a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But now, I think our reason is unclear. We seem to fight just to win.

The war has gone on long enough. The people in that country need to take care of themselves. We have spent a lot of money. We should use that money to help our own country. We have problems with poverty and other things. We need to spend money on these problems.

We spend billions of dollars on the war. This is too much. We need to spend money on important things like schools, roads, and health care. We should not use money to kill our own people in a war we no longer have a good reason to fight.

Some people say it is bad for people to look at other people's Myspace pages. They say it is not right to see things that are private. But some people say it is not bad. They say that if you put things on Myspace, you are sharing them with everyone. You have to be careful what you put on the web.

It is hard to say if it is right or wrong. Some people use Myspace to talk to friends. Others use it to share information. It is important to be safe online. You should not meet people you do not know from Myspace. 

Some schools do not allow students to have Myspace. This is because they are worried about safety. They do not want students to share too much information online.

The Iraq War is a bad idea. Many people think this. They say it was a bad idea from the start. 

People in the United States, Iraq, and the world think the war was wrong. Many soldiers in the war think so too. They want to go home.

The war was bad before we went there. It is bad now. Leaving will be hard, but staying is bad too.

The United States and the Middle East are very different. The United States tries to bring democracy to the Middle East, but this does not work. People in the Middle East want to run their own lives.

Saddam Hussein was bad. But we should think about the good and bad before we go to war with a country.

The war was like quicksand. We went in and got stuck.

I do not know what to say. I do not see a reason to stay in Iraq.

The government says we need to stay. They say there will be problems if we leave. I do not agree. I have not heard a good reason to stay.

We could leave slowly. This might be okay. But I want to leave now.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. They say we should go this year. These are the people we are trying to help. They know best.

If we ask them if we should leave and they say yes, then it is not our fault if things go wrong. We will be the good guys.

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving would be better than staying.

Yes, I think people still have different views about men and women. 

It is not just about women. 

It is about the kind of work a person does. 

Women may have a harder time. There is a feeling that women should be in lower jobs, even if they are just as good as men.

This is because of how people have always been.

A woman may be able to do a job well, but some people will not want to give her a higher position.

This is the same for men.

For example, men who stay home to take care of children are often looked down upon. People think men should work outside the house.

In jobs like fashion, men are sometimes not taken seriously.

This is because people think fashion is only for women.

In all jobs, there are times when people are treated differently because they are a man or a woman.

It is hard to change these ideas.

But we are making progress. More women are in high positions.

More men are staying home with their children. 

People are starting to understand that men and women can do any job.

People say that marijuana was not made legal. They say it was made less bad. This means it was not a crime. It is more like a small ticket. You get a ticket, not arrested. People worry about the bad things that could happen if they get a ticket. They worry about jobs and other things.

Decriminalization means it is less bad. But it costs money to arrest people. It costs money to keep people in jail. It costs money to have courts. Some places do not have a lot of money.

Some places are against marijuana. They do not want to make it less bad. Other places are more open to it. They think it is good to spend less money on arrests and more money on other things.

People say marijuana should not be everywhere. It is still bad in some places. Some people do not like to see people smoking it.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana can be bad for a person's life. People react to things differently. Some people can use things in a good way. Some people cannot.

I say yes.

Many things the Catholic Church does are old. They do these things for a long time. It is good to follow traditions. It is also good to change when needed.

Some Catholics must go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

For example, my father was an Episcopalian. My mother was a Catholic. They did not marry in the Catholic Church. The church would not let them marry because of my father’s religion. This is not kind to people of other religions.

We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. It is wrong to say love others but not accept them. I feel the church tells people to do things, but the church does not follow its own rules. The rules are old and should change.

I think it would be good if priests could marry. This might not stop bad things from happening. Priests should not hurt children. This is wrong, no matter if they are married or not.

I think people who hurt children will hurt children. It does not matter if they are married or not.

This is a hard question for me. I am not sure what is right or wrong. But I think this is a very hard problem. It is about church and state. It is also about how to say what marriage is. It is hard to talk about this without hurting people. 

I think all unions should be the same. I don't know if marriage should be decided by the government. Marriage is like a religion. People do not get special things from the government if they are baptized. So, if you are married, the government should just see it as a union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

If all the states agree on something, then they should make it a law for the whole country. But changing the Constitution to say no to gay marriage is not right. The Constitution should not be changed for something that is important to some people. 

It is not important enough to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a family with Christian beliefs. Homosexuality is a hard topic for me. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with this life choice. But I think people should be able to marry. I do not think it is a big problem for the country. I think each state should decide about this. 

Some states are run by Democrats. Some are run by Republicans. Democratic states often support gay marriage. If you live in a state that supports gay marriage, you likely agree with that. You knew this when you moved there. I think you should respect that.

I believe everyone should have the same chances.

I think states should decide about gay marriage. I do not support President Bush's decision to ban it. I think each state should be able to choose. The president does not live in all states. He should not make decisions for all states. Some things should be up to each state. President Bush will not be president forever. A new president may change the law.

I think it is better to let states decide. They are the ones who will live with the decision.

Myspace is for the public. It is like a bulletin board. If you post something on Myspace, others can see it. This includes school officials. They can see what students are posting even if they are not using the school's name.

School officials have a duty to keep students safe. If they see something on Myspace that might stop a school shooting, they have the right to see it.

It is different if they look at Myspace just to find students doing bad things. That is an invasion of privacy.

But if they are trying to make the school safer, it is not an invasion.

Everything on the internet can be found later. This is true even if students do not mean to share things with everyone.

It is important for students to think before they post anything online.

The war is hard. I was strong for it at first. Nine Eleven hurt me. I want to hurt them like they hurt us. But I think we made a mistake. We did not think about the future. We went to war without a plan. Now I am against the war. I think the people there should fight among themselves. We should not fight their fight. 

I do not care about them. They fight too much. They are not like us. We went to war because we were angry. President Bush wanted to go to war. The people wanted to go to war. We did not know what to do. We did not have a good plan.  We did not know how to make things better. 

I think we should leave.

Gay couples should have the same rights as straight couples. This includes things like health care. If a person is sick, their partner should be able to see them in the hospital.

Gay couples are not asking to marry in a church. They want a marriage paper from the government. The government should not mix religion with laws.

Gay people are the same as straight people. They want to be happy and have families. Children of gay couples are the same as children of straight couples.

If we change how people think about marijuana, they will use it in a good way.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. They say we should go this year. These are the people we are trying to help. They know best.

If we ask them if we should leave and they say yes, then it is not our fault if things go wrong. We will be the good guys.

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving would be better than staying.

Yes, I think people still have different views about men and women. 

It is not just about women. 

It is about the kind of work a person does. 

Women may have a harder time. There is a feeling that women should be in lower jobs, even if they are just as good as men.

This is because of how people have always been.

A woman may be able to do a job well, but some people will not want to give her a higher position.

This is the same for men.

For example, men who stay home to take care of children are often looked down upon. People think men should work outside the house.

In jobs like fashion, men are sometimes not taken seriously.

This is because people think fashion is only for women.

In all jobs, there are times when people are treated differently because they are a man or a woman.

It is hard to change these ideas.

But we are making progress. More women are in high positions.

More men are staying home with their children. 

People are starting to understand that men and women can do any job.

People say that marijuana was not made legal. They say it was made less bad. This means it was not a crime. It is more like a small ticket. You get a ticket, not arrested. People worry about the bad things that could happen if they get a ticket. They worry about jobs and other things.

Decriminalization means it is less bad. But it costs money to arrest people. It costs money to keep people in jail. It costs money to have courts. Some places do not have a lot of money.

Some places are against marijuana. They do not want to make it less bad. Other places are more open to it. They think it is good to spend less money on arrests and more money on other things.

People say marijuana should not be everywhere. It is still bad in some places. Some people do not like to see people smoking it.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana can be bad for a person's life. People react to things differently. Some people can use things in a good way. Some people cannot.

I say yes.

Many things the Catholic Church does are old. They do these things for a long time. It is good to follow traditions. It is also good to change when needed.

Some Catholics must go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

For example, my father was an Episcopalian. My mother was a Catholic. They did not marry in the Catholic Church. The church would not let them marry because of my father’s religion. This is not kind to people of other religions.

We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. It is wrong to say love others but not accept them. I feel the church tells people to do things, but the church does not follow its own rules. The rules are old and should change.

I think it would be good if priests could marry. This might not stop bad things from happening. Priests should not hurt children. This is wrong, no matter if they are married or not.

I think people who hurt children will hurt children. It does not matter if they are married or not.

This is a hard question for me. I am not sure what is right or wrong. But I think this is a very hard problem. It is about church and state. It is also about how to say what marriage is. It is hard to talk about this without hurting people. 

I think all unions should be the same. I don't know if marriage should be decided by the government. Marriage is like a religion. People do not get special things from the government if they are baptized. So, if you are married, the government should just see it as a union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

If all the states agree on something, then they should make it a law for the whole country. But changing the Constitution to say no to gay marriage is not right. The Constitution should not be changed for something that is important to some people. 

It is not important enough to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a family with Christian beliefs. Homosexuality is a hard topic for me. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with this life choice. But I think people should be able to marry. I do not think it is a big problem for the country. I think each state should decide about this. 

Some states are run by Democrats. Some are run by Republicans. Democratic states often support gay marriage. If you live in a state that supports gay marriage, you likely agree with that. You knew this when you moved there. I think you should respect that.

I believe everyone should have the same chances.

I think states should decide about gay marriage. I do not support President Bush's decision to ban it. I think each state should be able to choose. The president does not live in all states. He should not make decisions for all states. Some things should be up to each state. President Bush will not be president forever. A new president may change the law.

I think it is better to let states decide. They are the ones who will live with the decision.

Myspace is for the public. It is like a bulletin board. If you post something on Myspace, others can see it. This includes school officials. They can see what students are posting even if they are not using the school's name.

School officials have a duty to keep students safe. If they see something on Myspace that might stop a school shooting, they have the right to see it.

It is different if they look at Myspace just to find students doing bad things. That is an invasion of privacy.

But if they are trying to make the school safer, it is not an invasion.

Everything on the internet can be found later. This is true even if students do not mean to share things with everyone.

It is important for students to think before they post anything online.

The war is hard. I was strong for it at first. Nine Eleven hurt me. I want to hurt them like they hurt us. But I think we made a mistake. We did not think about the future. We went to war without a plan. Now I am against the war. I think the people there should fight among themselves. We should not fight their fight. 

I do not care about them. They fight too much. They are not like us. We went to war because we were angry. President Bush wanted to go to war. The people wanted to go to war. We did not know what to do. We did not have a good plan.  We did not know how to make things better. 

I think we should leave.
